summary: Diff implements deterministic clean rebuild and redeploy scripting, including checks for regenerated bindings and absence of the legacy getAllSurgeryCases reference. However, it also includes many unrelated frontend feature/code changes that go beyond the requested deployment/binding fix scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial new/changed frontend application behavior and UI (auth flow updates, troubleshooting banner, header/footer changes, case form changes including new notes field, new date input component, etc.) beyond the requested clean rebuild/redeploy/binding verification fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to fixing frontendâ†”backend binding/deployment mismatch and states non-goal of adding new product features beyond that.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded offline persistence, sync logic, CSV import/export changes, and extensive timezone-safe date handling utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-4/5/6 and appears to be new functionality unrelated to deterministic rebuild/redeploy and binding verification.

hallucinated_features.description: Renaming/rewriting backend query hooks to use pagination (useGetSurgeryCasesPaginated) and store integration changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: While it references removal of getAllSurgeryCases, the BuildRequest requirements focus on regenerating bindings and ensuring no references remain; it does not request broader React Query/store refactors.

hallucinated_features.description: Edits to project tracking metadata (project_state.json) introducing AR items with REQ-1/2/3 and duplicating REQ-4/5/6 entries marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest requirements and introduces unrelated requirement IDs (REQ-1/2/3) not present in the BuildRequest.
